17176.「そうですか…… この家に\n おぞましい化け物が 来たというのですね。:
I see... you say that a horrifying monster has
come to this house.

17177.「ええ……。ただでさえ 老い先短い身ですのに\n 寿命が １０年は ちぢんだ思い:
Even I am an old man with a short life expectancy, and I feel as if my life expectancy has shrunk by ten years. And on top
of that, I've been deprived of my Oath Cup.

17179.「今の若い人は 知らんかもしれませんが\n 誓いの盃ってのは 婚礼の儀で使う品で:
Young people today may not know this, but the
Oath Cup is an item used in wedding
ceremonies.

17180.「うちじゃ 代々 その誓いの盃を\n 作っておりますじゃ。そんなものを どうして:
We've been making that Oath Cup for
generations. I don't know how such a thing
came to be in the possession of a monster...

17181.「誓いの盃……？ それって たしか……。: Oath Cup? I believe they're called...

17182.「そして 永遠を約束する 誓いの盃を\n ふたりで 交わそう。:
Then, let us exchange our Eternal Vow Cups
together.

17183.「そうだ……。あのラブレターに\n 誓いの盃って書いてあったわ。\n ヒメア様:
Oh, yes... that love letter said Oath Cup.
Himea-sama, what on earth is that beast...?

17184.「あ………。お許しください。\n あたし つい 出過ぎたことを。: Please forgive me. I was out of line.

17185.「かまいません。\n そなたらには 話しておきましょう。: It's okay. I'll tell you about it.

17186.「しかし あの獣のことを 語る前に\n まず 私のことを 話さねばなりませんね。:
But before we talk about that beast, we must
first talk about me.

17187.「ツスクルの民は 世界樹に仕える一族です。\n 中でも 秀でた者は 世界樹の守り:
The people of Tsusukul serve the Yggdrasil. Those who excel among them are chosen as guardians of the Yggdrasil, and are granted a
long life through the forbidden art of immortality.

17188.「そう……私は ５００年前に\n 一族から選ばれた 世界樹の守り人なのです。:
Yes...I am the guardian of the Yggdrasil,
chosen by my family 500 years ago.

17189.「……しかし 不老の禁術によって与えられた \n 長い寿命は 私にとっては\n:
...But the long life granted by the Elixir of
Life was a curse to me.

17190.「誰も彼も皆 私を置いて 死んでゆく……。\n 愛する者と 共に生きることも で:
No one dies without me... and no one can live with those they love... for that is the fate of those who live forever. That is the fate of
those who live forever.

17191.「……しかし 私は その さだめに逆らい\n 許されぬ あやまちを犯しました。\:
However, I made an unforgivable mistake in
defying that decree. 300 years ago...

17192.「私は コハクという名の 男に出会いました。: I met a man named Kohaku.

17193.「不思議な男でした…… 誰もが \n 私の さだめを知ると 去っていくのに\n:
He was a strange man... everyone left when
they found out about my decision, but he
didn't seem to care at all.

17194.「彼の そばにいると 心が安らぎました。 \n いつしか 私たちは 愛し合うよう:
I felt at peace when I was with him. Before
long, we fell in love and... and...

17195.「ヒメア。ともに 永遠を生きよう。: Himea. Together we shall live forever.

17196.「不老の禁術を 僕に使ってくれ。\n 君を 孤独から救いたい。:
I want you to use the Elixir of Immortality on
me. I want to save you from loneliness.

17198.「コハクの身体は 不老の禁術のチカラに\n たえることが できなかったのです。:
Kohaku's body was not able to resist the power
of the Elixir of Immortality.

17199.「私は ツスクルの村に 戻ることにしましょう。\n ……コハクのことは そなたた:
I will return to Tsusukul Village. Please keep
Kohaku in your hearts.

17201.「この手紙を見てください！\n もしかして これは…… \n ヒメア様に宛てられ:
Look at this letter! Could it be... that this
is addressed to Himea-sama?

17202.「そなた……。\n その手紙を いったい どこで……。: You... where did you get that letter?

17203.「生涯をかけて 君を幸せにしたい。\n 神代の間にて 願いが 天に通じたなら\n:
I want to make you happy for the rest of my
life. If my wish is granted by the Sky Room, I
will go to that promised hill.

17204.「そして 永遠を約束する 誓いの盃を \n ふたりで 交わそう…………。:
And then we will exchange our Eternal Vow
Cups...

17205.「この手紙は コハクさんが禁術を受ける前に \n ヒメア様に 宛てて書いた\n:
This letter was written by Mr. Kohaku to
Himea-sama before he underwent the forbidden
technique, promising to marry her.

17206.「きっと コハクさんは 心を失った今でも\n この手紙に書いた約束を……\n ３:
I am sure that even now that Mr. Kohaku has
lost his mind... he still remembers the
promise he made in this letter 300 years ago.

17207.「だから それを果たすために\n この家に来て 誓いの盃を……。:
So, to fulfill that, we come to this house, we
drink the Oath Cup...

17208.「つまらぬことを……。\n コハクは もう人ではない。\n それは 誰より 私が:
Boring thing... Kohaku is not a person
anymore. I know that better than anyone.

17209.「それゆえ ３００年も 閉じ込めてきたのです。\n 命を絶ってやることが コハク:
That's why he's been locked away for 300 years. Knowing that it was in Kohaku's best interest to end his life, but unable to do
so...

17211.「……<pc>さん。\n 一緒に ヒメア様のこと 探してくれて\n ありがとうご:
...<pc>. Thank you for searching for
Himea-sama with me. Here's a thank you.

17212.「あたしたちが ヒメア様のために\n できることって ないのかな……。: Is there anything we can do for Himea-sama...

17213.「……天は 私たちの願いを 聞き入れなかった。: ...the heavens did not hear our pleas.

17214.「二日におよぶ 禁術の斉唱の末に \n 私が目にしたのは コハクの爪に 引き裂か:
After two days of chanting the forbidden arts,
I saw my followers torn apart by Kohaku's
claws and left to fall in a pitiful heap.

17215.「神代の間は 変わり果てたコハクによって \n 赤く染まった。私は 彼を牢に閉じ:
The God's Hall was stained red by the transformed Kohaku. I had no choice but to lock him in prison and seal up the entire
God's Hall...

17216.「そして １０年……１００年……３００年。\n 私は コハクを救う方法を 探し続:
And 10 years... 100 years... 3 Three hundred years. I kept looking for a way to save Kohaku. But the more time passed, the more I
realized.

17217.「コハクを救う道など…… \n どこにも 存在しないのだと。: There is no way to save Kohaku.

45607.「生涯をかけて 君を幸せにしたい。 \n 神代の間にて 願いが 天に通じたなら\:
I want to make you happy for the rest of my
life. If my wish is granted by the Sky Room, I
will go to that promised hill.
